content.raw: I think I was asking something pretty similar here [#!/osrf/subt/issues/113/what-packages-are-needed-to-use](#!/osrf/subt/issues/113/what-packages-are-needed-to-use). The other part \(except ign-transport\) is ROS communication. I believe those 2 things need to be inside the solution package in order to be able to talk to the other docker container.
content.html: I think I was asking something pretty similar here #!/osrf/subt/issues/113/what-packages-are-needed-to-use. The other part (except ign-transport) is ROS communication. I believe those 2 things need to be inside the solution package in order to be able to talk to the other docker container.
